arts.ttl: Lyon vs PSG – Neves’ powerful words after the victory
arts.sum: João Neves, the 21-year-old Paris Saint-Germain midfielder, spoke to Ligue1+ after the 3-2 victory against Olympique Lyonnais this Sunday at Parc OL in Matchday 12 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. He emphasized the success, even though there is still work to be done. Neves: “A very difficult match for us. We still have things […]

arts.ttl: Lyon/PSG Highlights (2-3): Neves Emerges as Parisian Hero!
arts.sum: Catch the full Lyon/PSG highlights featuring goals from Warren Zaïre-Emery, Afonso Moreira, Khvicha Kvaratskhelia, and Ainsley Maitland-Niles. In a thrilling clash at Groupama Stadium, Paris Saint-Germain edged out Lyon 3-2 in Matchday 12 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season — despite moments of shaky control from the visitors. arts.ttl: Lyon vs PSG – Paris’ ratings: errors, players struggling, but Neves saves the match
arts.sum: This Saturday, during the first matchday of the 2025-2026 Champions League, Paris Saint-Germain faced Olympique Lyonnais at Groupama Stadium. After a match where the Red and Blue are clearly struggling at the moment, thanks to Joao Neves, they managed a last-gasp 3-2 victory. Here are our player ratings for the Parisians. arts.ttl: Lyon 2-3 PSG: João Neves strikes late to send champions top of Ligue 1
arts.sum: Lyon host PSG to conclude Ligue 1's MD 12 with many key players missing out tonight's showpiece. The hosts were without midfield controller Corentin Tolisso

arts.ttl: Lyon vs PSG – Live pre-match coverage of the Parisians

arts.ttl: Lyon vs PSG – Fonseca wants an ambitious OL despite everything
arts.sum: This Sunday at 8:45 PM (CET), Paris Saint-Germain (1st) faces Olympique Lyonnais (6th) at Groupama Stadium for Matchday 12 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. arts.ttl: Lyon vs PSG – Luis Enrique wants to show the resilience of his players
arts.sum: Luis Enrique, coach of Paris Saint-Germain (1st), held a press conference this Saturday ahead of facing Olympique Lyonnais (6th) at Groupama Stadium on Sunday (kick-off at 8:45 pm, CET) for Matchday 12 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season.
